data.text: Just tagging you in case the podcast episode above might be of interest to you/your members @britsoci @AustSoc @ESA_Sociology @the_FSA @genderanded @MenEngage @Beyond_Equality @WhiteRibbon_UK @MichaelGLFlood @Promundo_US 🙂
